summary: In June 2018, FEMA started to shift responsibility for helping people with disabilities affected by disasters away from its staff trained on disability issues to all staff and to state, local, and nonprofit partners. In our May 2019 report , we recommended, among other things, that FEMA develop plans to train its staff and nonfederal partners on disability issues. We testified that FEMA has taken...
title: Disaster Assistance: FEMA Has Taken Steps toward Better Supporting Individuals Who Are Older or Have Disabilities
